alert.note: Alert for Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 01 at 2:45PM CDT until June 03 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Texas... Sweetwater Creek at Kelton 5N affecting Wheeler County. For the Sweetwater Creek...including Kelton 5N...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek at Kelton 5N. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Water overflows both banks. Cattle in flood plain are threatened and should have easy access to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 7.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Action stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon at 300 PM CDT.
